___synced.description: This field indicates whether the collection is synced

___remoteLink.description: Contains the link to the collection when it's uploaded.

___public.description: This field indicates whether the collection is public

___subscribed.description: This field indicates whether the collection is subscribed

___name.description: This is the name of a collection.

items.description: A request represents an HTTP request.
items.title: Schema for a Postman collection request

___collection.description: This is the ID of the collection that contains this request.

items.description: A response represents an HTTP response.
items.title: Schema for a Postman collection response

___language.description: The language associated with the response.

___previewType.description: Controls how the response is shown in the preview pane

___requestObject.description: Contains the whole request object associated with this response.

___lastUpdatedBy.description: This is the ID of the user who last updated this response.

___name.description: This is the name of the Cookie.

___httpOnly.description: Indicates if this cookie is HTTP Only.

___session.description: True if the cookie is a session cookie.

___hostOnly.description: Indicates if this cookie is Host Only.

___expirationDate.description: The timestamp of the time when the cookie expires.

___secure.description: Indicates if the 'secure' flag is set on the Cookie.

___storeId.description: The ID of the cookie store containing this cookie.

___domain.description: The domain for which this cookie is valid.

___path.description: The path associated with the Cookie.

___name.description: This is the name of this response.

___text.description: The raw text of the response.

___time.description: The time taken by the request to complete.

___request.description: This is the ID of the request associated with this response.

___size.description: The size at which the response is shown to the user.

___searchResultScrolledTo.description: Indicates whether search results are scrolled to in the response pane.

___detail.description: Detailed explanation of the response code.

___owner.description: This is the ID of the owner of this response.

___id.description: This is the unique ID of this response.

___write.description: This field indicates whether the folder is writable

___rawDataType.description: The data type of the raw response.

___collectionId.description: This is the ID of the collection that contains this request.

___synced.description: This field indicates whether the request is synced

___dataMode.description: Represents the data mode for this request.

___method.description: The HTTP method associated with this request.

___pathVariables.description: Contains the path variables in this request.

___version.description: Specifies the version number of the request.

___url.description: Contains the URL for this request.

___preRequestScript.description: A script that is run before executing the request.

___currentHelper.description: The authentication helper used with the request.

___write.description: This field indicates whether the request is writable

___rawModeData.description: Contains the raw data sent to the server

___lastUpdatedBy.description: This is the ID of the user who last updated this folder.

___tests.description: A script that is run after executing the request, which may act on the response.

___folder.description: This is the ID of the folder that contains this request.

___helperAttributes.description: Holds the values of parameters indicated by currentHelper

___descriptionFormat.description: The format of the description text.

___name.description: This is the name of this request.

___headers.description: This is a string containing all the custom headers for this request, e.g: Authorization.

___owner.description: This is the ID of the owner of this request.

___id.description: This is the unique ID of this request.

___description.description: This is a block of text that describes the collection.

items.description: A folder is an ordered set of requests. It allows for much better organization of one's requests.
items.title: Schema for a Postman collection folder

___collection.description: This is the ID of the collection that contains this folder.

___lastUpdatedBy.description: This is the ID of the user who last updated this folder.

___createdAt.description: The time at which this folder was created.

___collection_name.description: This is the name of the collection that contains this folder.

___name.description: This is the name of the folder.

___lastRevision.description: This field indicates the last revision of this folder.

___updatedAt.description: The time at which this folder was updated.

___description.description: This is a longer description of the folder.

___collection_id.description: This is the ID of the collection that contains this folder.

___owner.description: This is the ID of the owner of this folder.

___collection_owner.description: This is ID of the user who owns this folder.

___id.description: This is the unique identifier of a folder.

___write.description: This field indicates whether the folder is writable.

___owner.description: This is the ID of the owner of this collections.

___id.description: This is the unique identifier of a collection.

___write.description: This field indicates whether the collection is writable
